system.description: Dragonborn are proud and noble draconic humanoids, born with the blood of ancient dragons flowing through their veins. They combine the strength and majesty of dragons with humanoid versatility.
traits: Draconic Ancestry: You have draconic ancestry which determines your breath weapon and damage resistance.
Breath Weapon: You can exhale destructive energy once per short rest.
Damage Resistance: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.
